data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Stuttgart get the game underway.
Throw-in Schalke.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Stuttgart in their own half.
Stuttgart are coming forward and Mateo Klimowicz gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Gelsenkirchen.
In the minute 6, Schalke have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Brand.
Throw-in for Schalke in the half of Stuttgart.
Schalke drive upfield and Can Bozdogan gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Stuttgart defender.
In the minute 7, Benjamin Brand awards the home team a throw-in.
Schalke awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Schalke awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Schalke at VELTINS-Arena.
Benjamin Brand signals a free kick to Stuttgart in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 9, Stuttgart have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as Schalke is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Stuttgart get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Schalke's half?
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Schalke in their own half.
Free kick for Schalke in their own half.
Throw-in Stuttgart.
In the minute 12, Benjamin Brand signals a free kick to Schalke in their own half.
Goal kick for Schalke at VELTINS-Arena.
Benjamin Brand awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 18, Can Bozdogan of Schalke gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Stuttgart goal kick.
Throw-in for Schalke at VELTINS-Arena.
In the minute 20, Schalke's Mark Uth misses with an attempt on goal.
Stuttgart have a goal kick.
In Gelsenkirchen a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 22, Benjamin Brand signals a Stuttgart throw-in in Schalke's half.
Benjamin Brand awards Schalke a goal kick.
Goal kick for Stuttgart at VELTINS-Arena.
In the minute 24, Ball safe as Schalke is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Pascal Stenzel of Stuttgart smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Stuttgart.
In the minute 26, Schalke awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Schalke capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Goal! Schalke take a 1-0 lead through a well-placed header from Malick Thiaw.
In the minute 30, Great play from Amine Harit to set up the goal.
Mateo Klimowicz for Stuttgart gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Schalke have a goal kick.
In the minute 32, Benjamin Brand signals a throw-in for Stuttgart, close to Schalke's area.
Stuttgart to take a throw-in in Schalke territory.
Free kick for Stuttgart in their own half.
In the minute 35, Schalke needs to be cautious. Stuttgart have an attacking throw-in.
Schalke's Goncalo Paciencia gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Stuttgart defender.
Mateo Klimowicz (Stuttgart) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 37, Orel Mangala (Stuttgart) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Stuttgart to take a throw-in in Schalke territory.
Gonzalo Castro for Stuttgart has been booked by Benjamin Brand and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 38, Schalke drive forward but Goncalo Paciencia is judged offside.
Throw-in for Schalke close to the penalty box.
Free kick Schalke.
In the minute 41, Can Schalke get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Stuttgart's half?
Throw-in for Stuttgart in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 42, Ball goes out of play for a Stuttgart goal kick.
Free kick for Stuttgart in the half of Schalke.
Gonzalo Castro (Stuttgart) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 44, Can Stuttgart capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Schalke's half?
Throw-in for Stuttgart in the half of Schalke.
Benjamin Brand blows against Schalke's Goncalo Paciencia for offside.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half has commenced. Schalke with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, Throw-in high up the field for Stuttgart in Gelsenkirchen.
Schalke awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The away team replace Sasa Kalajdzic with Nicolas Gonzalez.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Gelsenkirchen.
In the minute 48, Throw-in high up the field for Stuttgart in Gelsenkirchen.
Schalke have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Brand.
In Gelsenkirchen, Salif Sane of Schalke is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 49, Corner awarded to Schalke.
Throw-in for Stuttgart at VELTINS-Arena.
Stuttgart push forward at VELTINS-Arena and Mateo Klimowicz gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Schalke defence.
In the minute 51, Stuttgart drives forward and Wataru Endo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Schalke in their own half.
Benjamin Brand signals a free kick to Schalke in their own half.
In the minute 52, Throw-in Stuttgart.
Can Stuttgart capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Schalke's half?
Benjamin Brand signals a free kick to Stuttgart.
In the minute 55, An attacking Stuttgart player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Salif Sane (Schalke) has received a yellow card from Benjamin Brand.
Nicolas Gonzalez equalizes with a well-taken penalty.
In the minute 57, In Gelsenkirchen, Schalke push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Schalke awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Stuttgart in the half of Schalke.
Omar Mascarell (Schalke) has received a first yellow card.
Schalke will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Stuttgart.
Stuttgart have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Brand.
In the minute 63, Stuttgart's Mateo Klimowicz is on target but unsuccessful.
Schalke have a dangerous throw-in.
Benjamin Brand signals a Stuttgart throw-in in Schalke's half.
In the minute 64, Benjamin Brand waits before resuming play because Frederik Ronnow for Schalke is still down.
Frederik Ronnow for Schalke is back on the field again.
Benjamin Brand awards Schalke a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Borna Sosa gets his shot on target but fails to score for Stuttgart.
Free kick for Schalke in their own half.
In Gelsenkirchen a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 69, Nicolas Gonzalez (Stuttgart) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Gelsenkirchen.
Throw-in for Stuttgart close to the penalty box.
In the minute 70, Nabil Bentaleb is replacing Matija Nastasic for the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Stuttgart goal kick.
Stuttgart awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 72, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Stuttgart's Borna Sosa gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Benjamin Brand awards Schalke a goal kick.
In the minute 74, Benjamin Brand signals a free kick to Schalke in their own half.
Stuttgart to take a throw-in in Schalke territory.
Philipp Klement is on a sub for Mateo Klimowicz for Stuttgart.
In the minute 75, Pellegrino Matarazzo is making the team's third substitution at VELTINS-Arena with Silas Wamangituka replacing Borna Sosa.
Throw-in for Stuttgart in the half of Schalke.
Free kick for Schalke in their own half.
In the minute 77, Benjamin Brand awards the away team a throw-in.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Gelsenkirchen to check on Tanguy Coulibaly, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 79, Stuttgart's Tanguy Coulibaly is back in action after a slight knock.
Stuttgart awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pellegrino Matarazzo (Stuttgart) is making a fourth change, with Darko Churlinov replacing the possibly injured Tanguy Coulibaly.
In the minute 81, Benjamin Brand signals a free kick to Schalke.
Stuttgart's Nicolas Gonzalez has been booked in Gelsenkirchen.
Schalke push upfield and Malick Thiaw gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Stuttgart defence.
Can Stuttgart get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Schalke's half?
In the minute 83, Corner awarded to Stuttgart.
Benjamin Brand signals a Stuttgart throw-in in Schalke's half.
Benito Raman is replacing Mark Uth for Schalke at VELTINS-Arena.
Can Stuttgart get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Schalke's half?
In the minute 84, Schalke make their third substitution with Alessandro Schopf replacing Can Bozdogan.
Corner awarded to Stuttgart.
In the minute 85, Nicolas Gonzalez (Stuttgart) strikes at VELTINS-Arena but his header is cleared.
Stuttgart pushes forward through Gonzalo Castro, whose finish on goal is saved.
Benjamin Brand signals a throw-in for Stuttgart, close to Schalke's area.
In the minute 87, Schalke awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Stuttgart in the half of Schalke.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 88, Schalke's Goncalo Paciencia has run offside.
In Gelsenkirchen Stuttgart drive forward through Orel Mangala. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick Schalke.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Schalke drive upfield and Benito Raman gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Stuttgart defender.
Malick Thiaw (Schalke) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ball safe as Stuttgart is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Schalke to take a throw-in in Stuttgart territory.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
The away team have replaced Gonzalo Castro with Philipp Forster. This is the fifth substitution made today by Pellegrino Matarazzo.
